summary: MY VEHICLE'S ELECTRICAL POWER STEERING HAS GONE COMPLETELY OUT. IT WENT OUT ONCE WHILE I WAS FULLY STOPPED AT A RED LIGHT AND ANOTHER TIME WHILE I WAS GOING 70MPH ON THE HIGHWAY, RESULTING IN A COMPLETE LOSS OF STEERING IN THE VEHICLE. WHILE THE POWER STEERING WAS STILL WORKING SOMEWHAT, THE STEERING WHEEL WOULD JITTER/SHAKE LEFT AND RIGHT (MAINLY TO THE LEFT). THE VEHICLE'S POWER STEERING WOULD ALSO OCCASIONALLY BE OUT WHEN THE VEHICLE IS STARTED AND WOULD USUALLY COME BACK ON WHEN THE VEHICLE IS RESTARTED A FEW TIMES. THE VEHICLE IS CURRENTLY NOT SAFE TO DRIVE.
